column4: oh, anyone here any experience with running transmission from putty? I want to start it, have it download a torrent while I disconnect from putty
type in transmission &. set up the web ui in the options first
how do I set up the web uit first through a cli ?

go to the transmission website and get their repos. there is a "transmissioncli" package. also, go to the transmission channel. also, see if you can manually edit the config file in transmission through a text editor
